Package nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.persistence

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActorLoader
    This class is responsible for loading in the secondary actors from a Jar file stored in the levels directory
    GameStateController
    Controls the saving and loading of game states.
    Level
    This class represents a level of the game.
    LevelLoader
    A class responsible for loading level data from json files.
    State
    This class collects all the data required to save and load game states in a class to be easily serialised altogether using the GSON library.
